channel.title: Part2 on R-Ladies Global
channel.description: Recent content in Part2 on R-Ladies Global

item.title: 2. Behind the scenes of R-Ladies IWD2018 Twitter action!
item.description: As told by Kelly O’Briant On March the 8th, International Women’s Day, we ran a continuous feed of awesome R-Ladies profiles from our directory via @rladies_iwd2018. It was a blast! And a lot of team work too!
